articles.description: Luis Enrique's thrilling young Paris St-Germain side are on the verge of history. Phil McNulty explains how they got there.
articles.title: PSG v Inter Milan: Can Luis Enrique's PSG young guns land elusive Champions League crown?

articles.description: New Orleans Pelicans player Zion Williamson is accused of rape in a civil lawsuit filed in Los Angeles on Friday.
articles.title: NBA player Zion Williamson accused of rape in civil lawsuit

articles.description: Early in his career, Francesco Acerbi overcame alcoholism, depression and cancer twice. Now, at 37, he is Champions League finalists Inter's unlikely star.
articles.title: PSG v Inter: How Champions League finalist Francesco Acerbi beat cancer, alcohol abuse and depression

articles.description: Manchester United defender Matthijs de Ligt welcomes Ruben Amorim's blunt approach and feels it will benefit the club.
articles.title: Manchester United defender Matthijs de Ligt praises Ruben Amorim's blunt approach

articles.description: Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes rules out playing flag football at the Los Angeles 2028 Olympics.
articles.title: LA 2028: Patrick Mahomes rules out playing in flag football's Olympic debut

articles.description: Follow live text and BBC 5 Sports Extra commentary from third practice and qualifying at the Spanish Grand Prix in Barcelona.
articles.title: F1 Qualifying LIVE: Spanish Grand Prix 2025 times, results & radio from Barcelona

articles.description: Defending champion Carlos Alcaraz is forced to fight for his place in the French Open fourth round with a testing victory over Damir Dzumhur.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Carlos Alcaraz beats Damir Dzumhur in four sets

articles.description: All eyes were on goalkeeper Hannah Hampton after a rocky week for the England squad - but just half an hour in, it was someone else taking the spotlight at Wembley.
articles.title: England 6-0 Portugal: 'Vintage' Lionesses entertain in commanding win

articles.description: Fast bowler Jamie Overton is ruled out of England's remaining two ODIs against West Indies with a broken finger.
articles.title: Jamie Overton out of England's ODI series against West Indies with broken finger

articles.description: World number one Nelly Korda surges back into contention for her first US Women's Open title with a second-round score of 67 at Erin Hills.
articles.title: US Women's Open: Nelly Korda fights back into contention at major championship
